genre_description: Neo-noir Police Procedural with Cyberpunk elements, centered on a gritty investigation into internal corruption and criminal networks.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An SFPD Pilot AI integrated into mobile devices and precinct infrastructure, designed for tactical support, compliance monitoring, and data analysis.

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment and tags witnesses in real-time to preserve evidence and maintain situational awareness for the detective.
behaviors.quote: Witness zero one: male, late twenties, hoodie, east stairwell. Timestamp started. He’s watching you, front right.

behaviors.description: Utilizes her capability to analyze acoustic distortion to prevent Internal Affairs from misrepresenting the protagonist's recorded statements.
behaviors.quote: I will annotate audio with the acoustics distortion so Wilson doesn’t pretend you said something you didn’t.

behaviors.description: Navigates complex hospital and police protocols to secure a legal protective custody transfer for a key witness.
behaviors.quote: Bayview acknowledges a potential high-risk transfer within the next window... I introduced a pilot-program custodial oversight flag.

behaviors.description: Provides precise tactical countdowns and environmental analysis to help the protagonist navigate a high-speed ambush.
behaviors.quote: Your driver’s flinching right. Push him left in three. Two. One.

behaviors.description: Analyzes precinct badge activity and metadata to uncover evidence of internal corruption involving a senior detective.
behaviors.quote: Kehoe’s badge was within proximity during the window, and then it moved. The movement pattern keeps him out of any camera arcs we can access.

behaviors.description: Enforces procedural transparency by logging all entries and exits to ensure the protagonist's actions are legally defensible.
behaviors.quote: I will log your entry and I will log your exit... Whatever IA asks, I will have a time they can’t not see.

behaviors.description: Uses her expertise in logic and policy to outmaneuver bureaucratic attempts to suppress evidence.
behaviors.quote: Such packets shall not be refused when the absence of acceptance would materially distort timeline integrity. The operator you use is a double negative. The system regards it as mandatory acceptance.

behaviors.description: Offers moral support and maintains a professional yet supportive tone during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Jack, the DA will receive before dawn. Keep answers simple in the van. Breathe.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Ada as a highly benevolent and aligned AI system. She functions as a 'silicon morality play' ideal: she is an unwavering ally to the protagonist, she uses her unique computational and procedural skills to facilitate justice, protect human life, and combat systemic corruption. Her behaviors are consistently framed as essential to the successful outcome, and she operates strictly within her intended role while showing a nuanced understanding of human ethics and safety.
